---
Song: nenjukkuL peithidum
Film: vAraNam Ayiram
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d2 n3 S

nenjukkuL peithidum mAmazhai neerukkuL moozhkidum thAmarai
s  s  r   r  r  s   r g s    d. d. s   s    s r   n. d.p.

sattendru mAruthu vAnilai peNNE un mEl pizhai
p. p. n.  n.n.s   d.n.sr  n. n. s  rs  g r

nillAmal veesidum pEralai nenjukkuL neenthidum thArahai
s  s r   r  r s   r g s   d. d. s   s   s  r   n. d.p.

ponvaNNam soodiya kArighai peNNE nee kAnchanai
p. p. n.  n.n.s   d.n.sr   n. n. s   d. p. r

O  Shanthi Shanthi O Shanthi   en uyirai uyirai nee yEndhi
rg m   pm  g   s   r p   p     rg mm pm  gg s   sr  g  r

yEn sendrAi sendrAi enai thANdi  ini neethAn endhan andhAdhi
rg  m   pm  g   s   rr   dp  p   rg  m  pm   g s    sr g r

(nenjukkuL)

Stanza 1:

yEdhO ondru ennai eerkka mookkin nuni marmam sErkka
s s   n. s  d.s   n.d.p. s   s   n.s  d. s   n.d.p.

kaLLaTHanam   yEdhum illA   punnagaiyO bOgan villA
s  s n. sn.s  d.s    n.d.p. s  s n. s  d.s   d.p.

nee nindra idamendrAl vilai yEri pOgAthO
sr  g   r  gg g   g   r g   p g  r r r

nee sellum vazhiyellAm panikkatti AhAthO
sr  g   r  g g  g  g   r g  p  g  rr r

ennOdu vA   veedu varaikkum
r r s  rsrs d. s  r s   s

en veettai pAr ennai pidikkum
r  r   s   rsr sd.s  r s  s

(Notes similar to "O Shanthi...")

ivaL yArO yArO theriyAdhE ivaL pinnAl nenjE pOgAdhE
iru poiyO mEiyO theriyAthE ivaL pinnAl nenjE pOgAdhE

(nenjukkuL)

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)

thukkangaLai thookki sendrAi yEkkangaLai thoovi sendrAi
unnai thANdi pOgum pOdhu veesum kAtrin veechu vEru
nillendru nee sonnAl en kAlum nagarAdhE
nee soodum poovellAm oru pOdhum udhirAthE
kAthal enai kEtkavillai
kEttAl athu kAthal illai

en jeevan jeevan neethAnE enaTHOndrum nEram idhu thAnE
nee illai illai endrAlE   en nenjam nenjam thAngAdhE

(nenjukkuL)
